about_the_game:
"Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours"
is an engaging 2D turn-based RPG that takes players on a journey with Thelonius, a valiant knight of the kingdom of Astoria, who suddenly awakes in a completely unknown world. As Thelonius embarks on his adventure, players will experience a captivating story of mystery, loss, discovery, and friendship.

Throughout the game, players will guide Thelonius on his path to unravel the secrets of this new realm and aid him in his quest to return home.

With nostalgic driven visuals, classic turn-based gameplay, and a compelling story, "Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours" offers a captivating and thought provoking indie RPG experience.

Whether you are a seasoned fan of the classics, or a newcomer to the genre, "SK:EO" is certain to grab your attention. Are you ready to embark on an epic adventure with Thelonius, and discover the secrets that lie ahead?


For more content, community resources and bug reports, please visit our discord.

"Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours"
is an engaging 2D turn-based RPG that takes players on a journey with Thelonius, a valiant knight of the kingdom of Astoria, who suddenly awakes in a completely unknown world. As Thelonius embarks on his adventure, players will experience a captivating story of mystery, loss, discovery, and friendship.

With nostalgic driven visuals, classic turn-based gameplay, and a compelling story, "Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours" offers a captivating and thought provoking indie RPG experience.

Whether you are a seasoned fan of the classics, or a newcomer to the genre, "SK:EO" is certain to grab your attention. Are you ready to embark on an epic adventure with Thelonius, and discover the secrets that lie ahead?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 98 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 1ghz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
